CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 27, 1957, pg. 3 reads: " Small Fry Look Their Best - Bedecked in all of their Easter finery, some of the small fry of Brushton Methodist Church (which is interracial), at the corner of Hale and Kelly Sts., pose for The Courier photographer, Easter Sunday morning, following Sunday School and church services."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of children, some holding small potted plants, posed on steps of Brushton Methodist Church for Easter Sunday, Hale and Kelly Streets
